content: Diverting hundred of billions of dollars from fossil fuels into renewable energy and cutting energy waste would shave just 0.06% off expected annual economic growth rates of 1.3%-3%.
translations: ita:Deviare centinaia di miliardi di dollari dai combustibili fossili all'energia rinnovabile e riducendo gli sprechi energe
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by fekundulo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
